scripts.copy-images: copyfiles -u 1 "images/walletsymbol.svg" "images/home-symbol.svg" "images/disconnectsymbol.svg" "images/createsymbol.svg" "images/E7D/PNG Logo Files/Original Logo.png" "images/E7D/PNG Logo Files/Transparent Logo.png" "images/E7D/SVG Vector Files/Transparent Logo.svg" "images/E7D/Favicon/Favicon Original.ico" "images/E7D/Favicon/Wordpress.png" "images/E7D/Favicon/Wordpress Transparent.png" dist/images/
scripts.build: npm run build:spago && npm run build:css && npx vite build && npm run copy-images
scripts.serve: npm run build && npx vite serve
